actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on HELP.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Ricky Ray Hemophilia Relief Fund Act of 1998 to revise and extend certain provisions.

summary.text: Ricky Ray Fairness Act of 1999 - Amends the Ricky Ray Hemophilia Relief Fund Act of 1998 to: (1) remove a funding limit with respect to the Ricky Ray Hemophilia Relief Fund; (2) authorize payments from such Fund to individuals who are diagnosed with AIDS and meet certain other requirements; and (3) authorize Fund payments for individuals who were treated with HIV contaminated blood transfusion, components, or human tissue provided by a medical professional during the period beginning on January 1, 1982, through March 31, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Ricky Ray Hemophilia Relief Fund Act of 1998 to revise and extend certain provisions.
